00089     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00090         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00091     }
00092 
00093     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00094         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:postgresql:")) {
00095             return "org.postgresql.Driver";
00096         }
00097         return null;
00098     }

00168     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00169         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT relname AS SEQUENCE_NAME FROM pg_class, pg_namespace WHERE relkind='S' AND pg_class.relnamespace = pg_namespace.oid AND nspname = '" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "' AND 'nextval(''"+(schema==null?"":schema+".")+"'||relname||'''::regclass)' not in (select adsrc from pg_attrdef where adsrc is not null)");
00170     }
00171 
00172 
00173     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00174         return super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)
00175                 || "pg_catalog".equals(schemaName)
00176                 || "pg_toast".equals(schemaName)
00177                 || tableName.endsWith("_seq")
00178                 || tableName.endsWith("_key")
00179                 || tableName.endsWith("_pkey")
00180                 || tableName.startsWith("idx_")
00181                 || tableName.startsWith("pk_");
00182     }
00183 
00184     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00185         return true;
00186     }
00187 
00188 
00189     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00190         return new RawSqlStatement("select definition from pg_views where viewname='" + name + "' AND schemaname='"+convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName)+"'");
00191     }

00194     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00195         if (columnType.startsWith("java.sql.Types.VARCHAR")) { //returns "name" for type
00196             return columnType.replace("java.sql.Types.","");
00197         }
00198 
00199         String type = super.getColumnType(columnType, autoIncrement);
00200 
00201         if (type.startsWith("TEXT(")) {
00202             return getClobType();
00203         } else if (type.toLowerCase().startsWith("float8")) {
00204             return "FLOAT8";
00205         } else if (type.toLowerCase().startsWith("float4")) {
00206             return "FLOAT4";
00207         }
00208 
00209 
00210         if (autoIncrement != null && autoIncrement) {
00211             if ("integer".equals(type.toLowerCase())) {
00212                 return "serial";
00213             } else if ("bigint".equals(type.toLowerCase())) {
00214                 return "bigserial";
00215             } else {
00216                 // Unknown integer type, default to "serial"
00217                 return "serial";
00218             }
00219         }
00220 
00221         return type;
00222     }
00223

00225     public String getAutoIncrementClause() {
00226         return "";
00227     }
00228 
00229 
00230     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00231         if (defaultValue != null) {
00232             if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00233                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceAll("'::[\\w\\s]+$", "'");
00234 
00235                 if (dataType == Types.DATE || dataType == Types.TIME || dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00236                     //remove trailing time zone info
00237                     defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("-\\d+$", "");
00238                 }
00239             }
00240         }
00241         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00242 
00243     }
00244 
00245     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00246         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00247             return "public";
00248         } else {
00249             return StringUtils.trimToNull(requestedSchema).toLowerCase();
00250         }
00251     }
00252

00254         return null;
